---
name: RNR1_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae RNR1 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the RNR1 gene encoding the large subunit of ribonucleotide reductase in S. cerevisiae. This promoter is cell cycle regulated with peak expression during S phase when dNTP synthesis is required.
